content: Before reading I thought: Clearly Musk. After Reading: Why does it have to be just one? Plot Twist: The CEO’s are working together. The companies that collect all of our data are creating a huge database that can be accessed by robots designed by Boston Dynamics. Eventually, we’re forced to buy everything exclusively from Amazon using Paypal. The only mode of legal transportation becomes Uber. Bill Gates only stepped away from Microsoft to fund and lead this vision.
